name: Elayabarathi M V
headline: Frontend Web Developer
about: Welcome! I'm Elayabarathi, a professional biotechnologist with expertise in microbiology, genetics, and bioinformatics. Innovated cancer treatments via nanobiotechnology. Accomplished frontend web developer. Passionate about integrating biology and technology for innovation. Strong collaborator and problem-solver, dedicated to continuous learning and interdisciplinary success.

wetlab: Pre and Post Culturing Methods (Media Preparation, Centrifugation, Lyophilization)

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio built with React and Tailwind. Shows projects, blog, and interactive CV.

experience.details: Plan the direction and future for IT in accordance to the business continuity plan.

Built real-world projects like a CRUD user management app and an eCommerce site while learning both front-end and back-end development. Gained practical experience in coding best practices, debugging, and problem-solving.

Gained hands-on experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MongoDB, Express.js, Node.js, APIs, and more. Built real-world projects like a shopping list app and user management system, strengthening technical and analytical skills.

experience.position: Applied Microbiology abd Agricultural Biotechnology Intern
experience.details: Gained practical skills in microbial characterization, biofertilizer production, mushroom tissue culture, and Black Soldier Fly Larvae rearing. Built a strong foundation in applied microbiology and agricultural biotechnology.
Operated advanced machinery and contributed to eco-friendly packaging solutions. Gained valuable experience in sustainable agriculture and food processing, applying theory to real-world practice

education.institution: K. S. Rangasamy College of Technology (Autonomous)
education.description: Gaining a strong foundation in core principles and practical lab skills. Beyond academics, active participation in extracurricular and cultural events helped me develop leadership and interpersonal abilities. This experience nurtured my passion for continuous learning and innovation in biotechnology.

education.education: Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC) - Biology-Mathematics - State Board
education.institution: U. R. Palaniammal Matric Higher Secondary School
education.description: I built a strong academic foundation while growing both personally and socially. Guided by dedicated teachers, I developed critical thinking and a disciplined approach to learning. Involvement in sports, clubs, and cultural events helped strengthen my leadership and teamwork skills.

education.education: Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) - State Board
education.institution: U. R. Palaniammal Matric Higher Secondary School
education.description: Throughout my school years, I built a strong foundation in my studies. With the help of my teachers, I learned to study with discipline and think carefully.
